statements: SELECT * FROM promotions
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE demographic_group = 'Adults'
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_name DESC
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate > 10.00
SELECT DISTINCT demographic_group FROM promotions
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate > 10 ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE demographic_group = 'Adults' AND promotion_rate BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY promotion_name
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate < 5 OR promotion_rate > 20 ORDER BY promotion_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT promotion_name, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE demographic_group IN ('Adults', 'Children') ORDER BY promotion_name ASC
SELECT promotion_name, ROUND(promotion_rate*1.1, 2) AS discounted_rate FROM promotions WHERE demographic_group = 'Seniors' ORDER BY discounted_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM promotion_rates WHERE demographic = 'Male'
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotion_rates ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC
SELECT id, demographic FROM equity_assessments
SELECT * FROM promotion_rates WHERE promotion_rate > 25
SELECT demographic, equity_score FROM equity_assessments WHERE equity_score < 50
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotion_rates WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM promotion_rates WHERE promotion_rate < 50 AND demographic = 'Male' ORDER BY promotion_rate ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Count FROM promotion_rates WHERE demographic IN ('Male', 'Female');
SELECT promotion_rate, demographic, id FROM promotion_rates WHERE demographic LIKE 'F%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT demographic, equity_score FROM equity_assessments WHERE equity_score > 80 ORDER BY equity_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM promotion_rates;
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotion_rates WHERE promotion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT demographic, age, gender FROM demographic_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT demographic, promotion_id, assessment_date FROM equity_assessments WHERE assessment_result = 'Pass';
SELECT demographic, gender, ethnicity FROM demographic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND ethnicity = 'Asian';
SELECT id, demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotion_rates WHERE promotion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC;
SELECT demographic, age, gender FROM demographic_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT equity_assessments.assessment_date, equity_assessments.assessment_result, demographic_data.ethnicity FROM equity_assessments JOIN demographic_data ON equity_assessments.demographic_id = demographic_data.id ORDER BY equity_assessments.assessment_date ASC;
SELECT demographic, AVG(age) AS average_age, COUNT(*) AS count FROM demographic_data GROUP BY demographic HAVING count > 2;

SELECT promotion_rates.demographic, equity_assessments.assessment_result, AVG(promotion_rate) AS average_promotion_rate FROM promotion_rates JOIN equity_assessments ON promotion_rates.id = equity_assessments.promotion_id GROUP BY promotion_rates.demographic ORDER BY average_promotion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions;
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT demographic_name, age_group, gender FROM demographics ORDER BY age_group DESC;
SELECT * FROM equity_assessments WHERE assessment_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM promotion_analysis ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions LIMIT 5;
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC;
SELECT p.demographic, p.promotion_rate, e.assessment_score FROM promotions p INNER JOIN equity_assessments e ON p.id = e.demographic_id WHERE e.assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY p.promotion_rate DESC;

SELECT pa.success_rate, d.demographic_name, d.gender FROM promotion_analysis pa INNER JOIN promotions p ON pa.promotion_id = p.id INNER JOIN demographics d ON p.demographic = d.demographic_name WHERE pa.success_rate > 0.6 ORDER BY pa.success_rate DESC;

SELECT d.age_group, AVG(e.assessment_score) AS avg_score FROM demographics d LEFT JOIN equity_assessments e ON d.id = e.demographic_id GROUP BY d.age_group HAVING count(*) > 2 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM promotions;
SELECT demographic, promotion_rate FROM promotions ORDER BY promotion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE age_group = '18-25';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM assessment_results WHERE promotion_eligible = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE promotion_rate >= 0.50;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT d.demographic_group, e.assessment_score FROM demographics d JOIN equity_assessments e ON d.id = e.demographic_id WHERE e.assessment_score > 70;

SELECT er.employee_id, er.assessment_score, er.promotion_rate FROM assessment_results er JOIN equity_assessments e ON er.assessment_id = e.id WHERE e.assessment_score < 50 ORDER BY er.promotion_rate ASC;

SELECT d.demographic_group, COUNT(*) AS total_promotions FROM demographics d JOIN employee_details ed ON d.id = ed.demographic_id JOIN assessment_results ar ON ed.id = ar.employee_id WHERE ar.promotion_eligible = true GROUP BY d.demographic_group;
